Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Quick Data Viz tool

Mobile-first data visualization tool for public datasets.

Features:
- D3.js charts \(Line, Bar, Scatter\)
- Data sources: World Bank, Eurostat, Our World in Data
- URL state for shareable charts
- CSV/PNG export
- PWA support
- Curated indicator catalog

Tech stack: React, TypeScript, Vite, Zustand, D3.js

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

\)")
